item.description:
Fun, Lets celebrate the day and take our pups for an easy hike / walk ... Being the 1st meet up I am not sure how adventurous y'all want to get with the terrain and I picked something easy. Hopefully we'll get more adventurous as we get to know one another. Breezy and I Look forward to seeing you!

Chat soon,
Kristan
item.how_to_find_us: Lets Meet in the parking Lot I'll be driving a whitel Lexus SUV
item.name: Explore Blue Hills
